reviews.review:
Juego Recomendado. 
Dead by Daylight es un juego divertido para jugar con amigos, que vale la pena comprar porque el precio es accesible, y mucho m√°s si lo consegu√≠s en descuento.
Lo mejor es que constantemente actualizan contenido y mejoran el juego en todos sus aspectos. Se nota que lo siguen laburando y no lo dejan de lado. 
Lo peor es que la partida depende 100% del asesino que te toque, y en los niveles bajos se puede tornar aburrido si te enfrentas a uno tunelero/camper/etc.
Compratelooooooooooooooooooouuuuu.... compratelooooooooouuuuuuuuu (bastente caca los servidores, se cae seguido y se buguea, asi y todo compratelooooooooooooooooooo Emi)
es un juego muy distinto para todos los que no juegan frecuentemente juegos de terror

This type of game gets your adrenaline pumping, which i consider a good thing. Now that I have played some hours, the initial intensity has worn off, but this is still an amazing game even though I'm not that good at it. A definite recommend thus far.

EDIT: Ok, I now have over 50 hours so feel I can edit my review a bit. Let me say I had NO expectations of staying with this game. I thought, it will be fun but as a noob, but I will surely die often and get frustrated and hook this one on the rack of games I rarely touch. I was proved so wrong. In fact, I'm actually winning as a killer sometimes and even as a survivor (when teammates carry bc honestly I suck at survivor). I am learning that this game has MUCH more depth to it than I originally thought which keeps me clicking that play button more than my RL responsibilities allow me. 

Yes, you will die A LOT at first but hang in there, keep playing and focus on leveling up just one survivor or killer to get comfortable with it and develop their skills. Also, learn the maps! Map awareness is important in this game in order to outwit survivors as a killer, and to escape killers as a survivor.

Yes, you will encounter hackers but compared to other MP competitive games it's pretty rare. Just move on because the thrill of a good match beats out any bad experiences you may have. 

Final verdict: a DEFINITE BUY! ...especially if you like games that make you think on your feet, not just a twitch-happy FPS fest but a unique, immersive and challenging gaming experience.
very challenging but there are a lot of killers that are campers.

It's been a month since I played this game, and somehow it's more popular now than it ever has been. I understand, more than most, why this game may be perceived as enjoyable. When you get really good at it, it's satisfying. But it's hard to recommend this game to my friends in good conscience. The game is a bug-filled mess, patch after patch. No matter how many fixes they make, new, sometimes worse bugs always appear, and often these bugs can be game breaking, ultimately making playing a certain killer or using a certain perk pointless. The community is a toxic mess, and is an obvious case where the bad heavily outshines the good players. Half the killers in in this are either ridiculously overpowered, or worthless in nearly every scenario, with BHVR only putting out reworks once every blue moon. The grind in this game, if you're a completionist like me, is genuinely unbearable. I've sunk a month and a half of my life into this game, and I'm not even half way done maxing out every character. 

Trust me, it's easy to sink hours upon hours into this game at first. I did too. But looking back on it, I kinda wish I'd put these hours into a game like Apex or Valorant (two other games I love). If you get this game just to fuck around with friends and be an asshat, by all means, go ahead. But don't buy this game expecting a fair, balanced, bug-free, kind game to be coming your way.

EDIT : I've played about 200 more hours of this game as I type this, and I'm changing my recommendation, but only loosely. If you're the kind of person that likes the repetitive gameplay loops of games like destiny, then maybe I'd recommend this game. If you're someone who needs variation and constant new content to have fun, maybe pass on this one.

EDIT 2 : Sadako Rising just dropped and I'm honestly unsure of whether to still recommend the game or not. It's gotten to the point where yes, the chapters are cool, the characters are awesome and aesthetically the game is on point. But the bugs and questionable balance changes are CONSTANT, and despite having an extremely active twitter presence they're one of the most tone deaf dev companies I've ever heard of. Constantly ignoring what people want, and then with the NFT shit with Pinhead I just don't know anymore man.

La verdad muy buen juego, entretenido para pasar el rato con amigos o solo, pero hay un asesino "el doctor" que es horrible en todo aspecto, sus habilidades lo hacen un ser omnipotente en la partida no pudiendo esconderte de el ya que siempre sabe donde estas por la locura, la verdad cada vez que me toca contra el me dan ganas de desconectarme de la partida porque se que es muy injusto, ojala lo saquen permanentemente del juego o hagan que no pueda encontrarte tan facil por la locura, porque una de las gracias del juego es poder eludir al asesino y con el se hace imposivle.

Four years ago I would have recommended it without any doubt, nowadays my only advice to new players is... Get out, as far as you can.
